name: Monkey Runner (AlekGameDev)
description:
This is a project I have been working on called Monkey Runner, a simple mobile game where you play as a monkey running and jumping around a jungle collecting bananas while avoiding obstacles.

Check out how I made the game here: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=NVUANX3RedI&list=PLj65_8gyPUyIKI_ohHKesfPYTh0t11TcQ
